description: The course provides a systematic presentation of the factors to be considered when setting price, and shows how pricing alternatives are developed. Analytical methods are developed and new approaches are explored for solving pricing decisions.
name: PRICING POLICY

values.comments:
Marketing 754 provides a systematic presentation of the factors to be considered when setting price, and shows how pricing alternatives are developed. Analytical methods are developed and new approaches are explored for solving pricing decisions. 

Students agreed that this is a “very good introductory course for pricing with great frameworks and overview.” Nevertheless, the class is a quarter long and students felt that it was “way too fast and way too light.” Many students expressed a desire to take this course over an entire semester. The class begins with “brain teasers” which students loved and found very entertaining. The course involves “very light reading,” class participating, short homework assignments and a final team project with no tests. 

Professor Zhang is complimented as a “fabulous professor.” He makes you look at “pricing in a whole new way” and “does a great job communicating the material.” Students wrote that he is very knowledgeable and communicates the material very well, making “the classroom fun and a great place to learn.” 

This class is highly recommended. It is not quant heavy and was enjoyable for students. While many students felt that it could have gone more in depth in certain subjects and did not find it particularly challenging, the course is highly recommended to others.
